title: 大佬求助！！怎么用1.8原版做传送书啊，就是点击书里的文字可以涮送的！！
author: minghaijun6439
txt_content:
最近在做一个RPG需要制作一本书，
点击书里的文字就可以触发一些效果，这个要怎么搞啊？
哪位大佬教我一下
只要发个案例过来，
给我讲解一下每条指令就OK
谢谢啊

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙v⊙ 于 2018-3-1 18:12 编辑 
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"U",
title:"小本子",
HideFlags:7,
AttributeModifiers:[
0:{AttributeName:"generic.knockbackResistance",Name:"NoKnoB",Amount:1.0,Operation:0,UUIDMost:52864,UUIDLeast:157084}
],
pages:[

1:"
{text:'目录\n\n',
extra:[
{text:'药水\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:2}},
{text:'物品\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:3}},
{text:'模式&难度\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:4}},
{text:'规则\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:5}},
{text:'时间&天气\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:6}},
{text:'其他\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:7}}
]}",

2:"
{text:'',
extra:[
{text:'目录 - 药水\n\n',clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:1}},
{text:'速度 - '},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 127 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢128'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 5 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢6'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 4 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢5'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 3 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢4'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 2 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢3'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 1 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢2'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 0 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢1'}},
{text:'|',color:black},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:speed 1000000 0 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'速度1'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:speed 1000000 1 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'速度2'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:speed 1000000 2 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'速度3'}},
{text:'\n'},
{text:'抗性5\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:resistance 1000000 4 true'}},
{text:'隐身\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:invisibility 1000000 0 true'}},
{text:'夜视\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:night_vision 1000000 0 true'}},
{text:'失明\n',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:blindness 1000000 0 true'}},
{text:'跳跃 - '},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:jump_boost 1000000 250 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'跳跃-6'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:jump_boost 1000000 254 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'跳跃-2'}},
{text:'|',color:black},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:jump_boost 1000000 2 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'跳跃3'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:jump_boost 1000000 3 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'跳跃4'}},
{text:'\n'},
{text:'发光 - '},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:glowing 1000000 0 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'@p'}},
{text:'|',color:black},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/entitydata @e[r=10] {Glowing:1}'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'@e[r=10]'}},
{text:'O',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/entitydata @e[r=15] {Glowing:0}'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'清除@e[r=15]'}},
{text:'\n清除',color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p clear'}}
]}",

3:"
{text:'',
extra:[
{text:'目录 - 物品\n\n',clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:1}},
{text:'命令方块\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/give @p minecraft:command_block'}},
{text:'屏障\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/give @p minecraft:barrier'}},
{text:'末影箱\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/give @p minecraft:ender_chest'}},
{text:'水跃鱼\n',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/give @p minecraft:fish 1 3 {HideFlags:1,ench:[{id:19,lvl:25}],display:{Name:水跃鱼,Lore:[看穿了一切!!]}}'}}
]}",

4:"
{text:'',
extra:[

{text:'\n\n'},

{text:'普通|',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/difficulty 2'}},
{text:'困难',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/difficulty 3'}}
]}",

5:"
{text:'',
extra:[
{text:'目录 - 规则\n\n',clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:1}},
{text:'命令反馈 '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule sendCommandFeedback true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule sendCommandFeedback false'}},
{text:'\n火势蔓延 '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doFireTick true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doFireTick false'}},
{text:'\n天气变化  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doWeatherCycle true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doWeatherCycle false'}},
{text:'\n日夜交替  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doDaylightCycle true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doDaylightCycle false'}},
{text:'\n生物生成  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doMobSpawning true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doMobSpawning false'}},
{text:'\n方块掉落  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doTileDrops true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doTileDrops false'}},
{text:'\n背包保存  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule keepInventory true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule keepInventory false'}},
{text:'\n生物小偷  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule mobGriefing true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule mobGriefing false'}},
{text:'\n生物掉落物  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doMobLoot true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule doMobLoot false'}},
{text:'\n生物最大叠堆量  '},
{text:'[0]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule maxEntityCramming 0'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[24]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule maxEntityCramming 24'}},
{text:'\n旁观者生成区块  '},
{text:'[T]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule spectatorsGenerateChunks true'}},
{text:' '},
{text:'[F]',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/gamerule spectatorsGenerateChunks false'}}
]}",

6:"
{text:'时间&天气',bold:true,color:dark_aqua,
extra:[
{text:'   目录',clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:1}},
{text:'\n\nDay',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time set day'}},
{text:'    Night',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time set night'}},
{text:'\n晚霞',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time set 12345'}},
{text:'\n+700',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time add 700'}},
{text:'\n+1500',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time add 1500'}},
{text:'\n+4000',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/time add 4000'}},
{text:'\n\n晴空',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/weather clear'}},
{text:'    下雨',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/weather rain'}},
{text:'\n雷雨1000000',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/weather thunder 1000000'}},
{text:'\n\n晴天←→雷/雨',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/toggledownfall'}}
]}",

7:"
{text:'其他',
extra:[
{text:'   目录',clickEvent:{action:change_page,value:1}},
{text:'\n\n\n\n\n\n待补充...'},
{text:'\n          06/26/2017'}
]}"

]}复制代码

自己以前做的，如果玩家不能作弊权限的话，可能要把里面的命令换成trigger...而过长的命令要换成setblock，另放CB执行"超过玩家聊天栏最大字节数"的命令...

什么时候问答版可以编辑了，真好...

replies.txt_content:

一脸蒙蔽

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙v⊙ 于 2018-3-1 20:56 编辑 
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{author:"BBB",
title:"CCC",
pages:[

1:"
{text:'',
extra:[
{text:'ABA',color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p minecraft:slowness 1000000 127 true'},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:'缓慢128'}},
{text:'\n传送',color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/tp @p ~ ~5 ~'}},
{text:'\n清除',color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:'/effect @p clear'}}
]}"

]}复制代码

replies.author: 孟婆汤没了
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 谢谢大家了！不过我已经用一个叫mch的软件解决了
